title: ReferenceError while migrate the contracts

body:
> The problem is here:
> 
> ```
> const Migrations = artifacts.require("Wallet");
> 
> module.exports = function (deployer) {
>   deployer.deploy(Wallet);
> };
> ```
> 
> You named the variable `Migrations`, but then you tried to deploy `Wallet`.
> 
> Hope that helps!

Oh, that works! Thanks a lot. Sometimes bugs are in front of my eyes but I somehow cannot see them :)
